Package managers

Class HangmanGame

java.lang.Object
managers.HangmanGame
public class HangmanGame extends Object
HangmanGame manager, creates a hangman game window to play.

  • Constructor Details

    • HangmanGame

      public HangmanGame​(String word)
      Initializes defaults and creates the Hangman game Frame.
      Parameters:
      word - Word to guess
      See Also:
      HangmanFrame

  • Method Details

    • updateProgressStr

      public void updateProgressStr​(Character newChar)
      Takes a new character, finds its location(s) in the word to guess string and adds the letters to the progress string. Then the hangmanFrame is updated with the new progress string.
      Parameters:
      newChar - New character to add
      See Also:
      HangmanFrame

    • endGame

      public void endGame​(boolean playerWon)
      Ends the game, displays a pop up showing whether the player won or lost based on playerWon parameter.
      Parameters:
      playerWon - True means end game on player wins condition, False means end game on player loses condition

    • makeGuess

      public boolean makeGuess()
      Make guess, called by guess button actionevent. Takes input field text from hangmanframe and checks if letter guessed is correct.
      Returns:
      True represents successful guess (letter present), False represents letter not present
      See Also:
      HangmanFrame, GuessButtonListener

    • makeGuess

      public boolean makeGuess​(String word)
      Takes a string and checks whether it is the word, or the letter is present in the word. Handles updating the stickfigure or word progress based on whether the guess was successful.
      Parameters:
      word - Letter/word the user guessed
      Returns:
      True represents successsful guess (letter present), False represents letter not present

    • checkCompletion

      public boolean checkCompletion()
      Checks if the progress string is complete, all letters guessed
      Returns:
      True if all letters have been guessed, False if not.

    • hasWordBeenGuessed

      public boolean hasWordBeenGuessed​(String word)
      Checks if word has been guessed already
      Parameters:
      word - Word to check
      Returns:
      True if word has already been guessed, False if word hasn't been guessed yet

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the game, called on HangmanGame when ready to start game and launch window.
